gobblin.runtime.util

Class JobMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.GobblinMetrics
      • gobblin.runtime.util.JobMetrics

  • public class JobMetrics
extends GobblinMetrics
    An extension to GobblinMetrics specifically for job runs.

      • remove

        public static void remove(JobState jobState)
        Remove the JobMetrics instance for the job with the given JobState instance.

        Removing a JobMetrics instance for a job will also remove the TaskMetricss of every tasks of the job.

        Parameters:
        jobState - the given JobState instance
